CodeList.Name: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory MCI Version Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory MCI Version test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use Household Appliance: Power Tools

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use Household Appliance: Range

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Check all that were used: toaster oven.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use Household Appliance: Toaster Oven

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use Household Appliance: Vacuum

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Check all that were used: washer.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use Household Appliance: Washer

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL03-Aware of Appointment Ahead of Time
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL03-Aware of Appointment Ahead of Time
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her awareness of the meeting ahead of time.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Awareness of the Meeting Ahead of Time

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} balance his/her checkbook or credit card statement?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Balance Checkbook

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Balancing Checkbook

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} clean a load of laundry?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Clean Laundry

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} clean a living-, sitting-, or family room?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Clean Room

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Cleaning Room

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - During the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually carry through complex or time-consuming activities to completion?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Carry Through Complex Activities to Completion

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} drive a car?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Drive a Car

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Optimal Performance of Driving Car

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, explain.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Explain Extenuating Circumstance

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes extent to which he/she needed reminders.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Extent Needing Reminder

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Has an extenuating circumstance (such as a physical health problem, change in residence, change in support network, death of a family member, etc.) contributed to a recent alteration in the subject's activities of daily living?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Extenuating Circumstance

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he /she usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Finding Belongings

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually manage to find his/her personal belongings at home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Find Personal Belongings

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her optimal performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Optimal Performance of Travelling Outside Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} get around (or travel) outside of his/her home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Travel Outside Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever go shopping at a store?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Go Shopping At a Store

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of food preparation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Highest Level of Food Preparation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her highest level of performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Highest Level of Performance of Telephone Use

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} require supervision, or help, to perform any of these hobbies?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Require Help to Perform Hobbies

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - List any hobby (ies) that the subject has lost the ability to perform.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - List Hobbies Lost Ability to Perform

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent did {S} initiate complex daily activities or projects (e.g., hobbies, travel)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Initiate Complex Daily Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} keep appointments or meetings with other people, such as relatives, a doctor, the hairdresser, etc.?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Keep Appointments

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes how he/she usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Clean Laundry

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL03-Left at Home for 1 Hour or Longer
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL03-Left at Home for 1 Hour or Longer
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Was {S} left at home, for an hour or longer, during the day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Left at Home Longer Than an Hour

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL03-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL03-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Was {S} left at home, for less than 1 hour, during the day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Left at Home Less Than an Hour

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Was {S} left away from home, for 15 minutes or longer, during the day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Left Away From Home Longer Than 15 Minutes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, was {S} ever left on his/her own?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Left on His or Her Own

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} make him/herself a meal or snack at home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Make a Meal or Snack

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes the most complicated things that he/she wrote.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Most Complicated Things Written

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Which pastimes did he/she perform: art.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Perform Pastime, Hobby or Game: Art

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Pay for Items on His or Her Own

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} usually select correct items without supervision or help?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Select Correct Items Without Help

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Select or Ask for Something to Read

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, was this.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Taking Medications Regularly

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - During the past 4 weeks, did {S} take his/her medications regularly?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Take Medications Regularly

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} talk about events that occurred at home that he/she took part in or watched?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk About at Home Events

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} talk about current events?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk About Current Events

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} talk about events outside home involving family, friends, or neighbors?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk About Outside Home Events

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL03-Talk About TV Content While Watch
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL03-Talk About TV Content While Watch
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} usually talk about the content of a program while watching it?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk About Content of Program While Watching

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL03-Talk About TV Content Within a Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL03-Talk About TV Content Within a Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} talk about the content of a program within a day (24 hours) after watching it?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk About Content of Program After Watching Within a Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} usually talk about what he/she read 1-24 hours after reading?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk Within 24 Hours After Reading

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} usually talk about what he/she read while or shortly after reading (less than 1 hour)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Talk Within 1 Hour After Reading

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Did {S} converse without repeating him/herself, or asking the same questions repeatedly?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Converse Without Repeating

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - During the past 4 weeks, how long did it usually take {S} to complete complex or time-consuming tasks or activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Time Taken to Complete Complex Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Total Score.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - ADL Total Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Were any questions (1-18) answered 'Don't Know'? If yes, calculate total points for 'Don't Know'.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Points for Questions (1-18) Answered 'Don't Know'

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} use a telephone?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use a Telephone

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - For the 1 or 2 most commonly used appliances, which best describes how {S} usually used them.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Use of Commonly Used Appliances

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} use a household appliance to do chores?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Use Household Appliance

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - If yes, which best describes his/her usual performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Selecting First Clothes for the Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - Regarding physically getting dressed, which best describes his/her usual performance in the past 4 weeks.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Description of Usual Performance of Physically Getting Dressed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, MCI Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} watch television?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Watch Television

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL MCI - Write Things Down
